column6: If you want to leave an area, just climb into your ship!
ALL PILOTS REPORT TO THEIR STATIONS IMMEDIATELY
What's going on? Who's attacking us?
I don't know. It came out of nowhere.
I've got to go out there.
That's not what you said this morning!
Oliver, I want you to lead the other cadets out of the city.
Take your ships and get as far away as you can!
We'll meet up at the outpost on Vyke, got it?
Now go! We don't have time!
